üè∑Ô∏è"Popcorn with a rich caramel flavour that coats the palate nicely, you will also note the distinct slightly salty goodness of peanuts. You will enjoy this combination of flavours as the hint of peanut cuts the sweet richness of the caramel smoothly..." - [Link: Caramel Popcorn and Peanuts SC](https://www.wonderflavours.com/collections/super-concentrated-flavours/products/caramel-popcorn-and-peanuts-sc) | Suggested Dilution Ratio: 1-4%
